mapper.sql: SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, DUP_YN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, TEST_DATA_CNV_YN, PERS_INFO_CNV_YN, PERS_INFO_GRD, PERS_INFO_YN
mapper.select: SELECT /* WamSditmMapper.selectByPrimaryKey */ * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.DMN_LNM, B.DMN_PNM, G.DMNG_LNM, G.UPP_DMNG_LNM, D.INFOTP_LNM, D.DATA_TYPE, D.DATA_LEN, D.DATA_SCAL, GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM, GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM, GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM , IFNULL( ( SELECT F.DATA_TYPE_NM FROM WAA_DATA_TYPE_MAPRU E INNER JOIN WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE F ON E.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID = F.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.DBMS_TYP_CD='ORA' WHERE E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.LGC_DATA_TYPE=D.DATA_TYPE LIMIT 1 ),D.DATA_TYPE ) AS oraDataType , IFNULL( ( SELECT F.DATA_TYPE_NM FROM WAA_DATA_TYPE_MAPRU E INNER JOIN WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE F ON E.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID = F.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.DBMS_TYP_CD='MSQ' WHERE E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.LGC_DATA_TYPE=D.DATA_TYPE LIMIT 1 ),D.DATA_TYPE ) AS msDataType , IFNULL( ( SELECT F.DATA_TYPE_NM FROM WAA_DATA_TYPE_MAPRU E INNER JOIN WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE F ON E.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID = F.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.DBMS_TYP_CD='MYS' WHERE E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.LGC_DATA_TYPE=D.DATA_TYPE LIMIT 1 ),D.DATA_TYPE ) AS myDataType FROM WAM_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG G ON B.DMNG_ID = G.DMNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP C ON A.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND A.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE D ON C.INFOTP_ID = D.INFOTP_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ) TBL where SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert /* WamSditmMapper.insert */ into WAM_SDITM (SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, DUP_YN RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID,TEST_DATA_CNV_YN) values (#{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dupYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert /* WamSditmMapper.insertSelective */ into WAM_SDITM
SDITM_ID,
SDITM_LNM,
SDITM_PNM,
LNM_CRI_DS,
DMN_ID,
DMNG_ID,
INFOTP_ID,
INFOTP_CHG_YN,
ENC_YN,
DUP_YN,
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
TEST_DATA_CNV_YN,
#{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update /* WamSditmMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAM_SDITM
SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_PNM = #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUP_YN = #{dupYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_DATA_CNV_YN = #{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update /* WamSditmMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAM_SDITM set SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_PNM = #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUP_YN = #{dupYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEST_DATA_CNV_YN = #{testDataCnvYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT /* WamSditmMapper.selectSditmChangeList */ A.SDITM_ID , A.EXP_DTM , A.STR_DTM , A.SDITM_LNM , A.SDITM_PNM , A.LNM_CRI_DS , A.DMN_ID , A.DMNG_ID , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_CHG_YN , IFNULL(A.ENC_YN, 'N') AS ENC_YN , IFNULL(A.DUP_YN, 'N') AS DUP_YN , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , A.TEST_DATA_CNV_YN , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#FFBB00' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor , A.STND_ASRT , A.PERS_INFO_CNV_YN , A.PERS_INFO_GRD , A.PERS_INFO_YN FROM WAH_SDITM A WHERE A.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WamSditmMapper.saveSditmTransYnPrc */ WAH_SDITM
SET TRANS_YN = CASE WHEN #{transYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} =1 THEN 'Y' WHEN #{transYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} =0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'N' END WHERE SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.select: SELECT /* WamSditmMapper.selectSditmComparisonList */ A.* , '#0000FF' AS FontColor , X.DMN_PNM, X.DMN_LNM , Z.DATA_TYPE, Z.DATA_LEN, Z.DATA_SCAL FROM WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN X ON A.DMN_ID = X.DMN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE Z ON A.INFOTP_ID = Z.INFOTP_ID AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') WHERE A.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT A.* , '#000000' AS FontColor , X.DMN_PNM, X.DMN_LNM , Z.DATA_TYPE, Z.DATA_LEN, Z.DATA_SCAL FROM WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN X ON A.DMN_ID = X.DMN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE Z ON A.INFOTP_ID = Z.INFOTP_ID AND Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') WHERE A.SDITM_ID != #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT A.SDITM_ID AS "sditmId" , A.SDITM_LNM AS "sditmLnm" , A.SDITM_PNM AS "sditmPnm" , C.DATA_TYPE AS "lgcDataType" , C.DATA_Len AS "lgcDataLen" , C.DATA_SCAL AS "lgcDataScal" , D.DATA_TYPE AS "phyDataType" , D.DATA_LEN AS "phyDataLen" , D.DATA_SCAL AS "phyDataScal" , D.STND_ASRT AS "stndAsrt" , D.DBMS_TYPE AS "dbmsType" , GET_CMCD_DTL_NM('DBMS_TYP_CD',D.DBMS_TYPE) AS "dbmsTypNm" FROM WAM_SDITM A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND C.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_CHECK_SDITM D ON D.STND_ASRT = A.STND_ASRT AND D.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
